description: An illustration of a box of Pocky, a Japanese snack consisting of thin biscuit sticks coated in milk chocolate; the box is opened at the top, revealing two Pocky sticks inside and there are two more Pocky sticks overlapping one another in front of the box. The box is red, with an illustration of a single Pocky stick on the side and an illustration of three  overlapping Pocky sticks on the front with a white curved banner across the center where the sticks meet.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
